bug.author: trunghlt
bug.summary: [Ray] Raylet crashes due to overloaded, is that possible for it to auto-restart on crashes?
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
Ray version: 1.1.0 We are using Ray for running multiple tasks at different times. When a raylet crashes due to overloaded, is it possible to make it auto-restart so the next tasks don't result in error?

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ericl>@ericl</denchmark-link> Isn't it already supposed to be auto-started?
The AutoScaler already restarts it. This issue isn't well specified so I'm going to close it.
